description: This dish, which clamors for a beer, is a simple tangle of noodles, each strand glossed with a ruddy, vibrant mix of seasonings The method for cooking the noodles is unusual: very gentle and very effective I’ll wager it works with angel hair
title: Spicy Korean Temple Noodles
title_page: Spicy Korean Temple Noodles Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This dish, which clamors for a beer, is a simple tangle of noodles, each strand glossed with a ruddy, vibrant mix of seasonings. The method for cooking the noodles is unusual: very gentle and very effective. I’ll wager it works with angel hair.
More Korean recipes from NYTCooking.com.
Featured in: Lagers Enjoy A Renaissance.
